JobFullDesc:
You Lead the Way. We’ve Got Your Back.
At American Express, we know that with the right backing, people and businesses have the power to progress in incredible ways. Whether we’re supporting our customers’ financial confidence to move ahead, taking commerce to new heights, or encouraging people to explore the world, our colleagues are constantly redefining what’s possible — and we’re proud to back each other every step of the way. When you join #TeamAmex, you become part of a diverse community of over 60,000 colleagues, all with a common goal to deliver an exceptional customer experience every day. 
Function Description: 
Responsible for developing and monitoring statistical models for predicting individual, commercial or merchant risk. These models are used for key business decisions made across the customer life cycle to manage risk and accelerate profitable business growth. 
Purpose of the Role:
This position will play a key role in developing and maintaining risk models for commercial portfolio, especially focusing on merchant portfolio. The person would also be responsible for case review and regular model monitoring. Person would require working with partners across different functions and geographies.
Responsibilities:

Develop and Maintain the global risk models, focusing on merchant portfolio
Partner with Strategy and market risk teams across the globe to drive model usage and tackle business opportunities through model enhancements 
Incorporate new data intelligence  partnering with Data Science and Market risk teams 
Establish and Maintain a disciplined process of review customer cases to identify new model/variable opportunities 

Critical Factors to Success:

Strong analytical skills and an innovative approach to solving both practical and theoretical problems and a tremendous will to win
Demonstrated ability to provide insight and accurate judgment in addressing and resolving business challenges and opportunities 

 
Past Experience:

At least 4-5 years of industry experience in Decision Science in preferred. Experience in dealing with Commercial /Merchant portfolios is an added advantage

Academic Background:

PhD or Post-Graduate degree in Management/Statistics/Mathematics is preferred 

Functional Skills/Capabilities:

Sound knowledge of Machine learning algorithms/econometrics/statistics/data mining and research methods. 
Exceptional verbal, written, and interpersonal communication 
Ability to handle a team of 3-4 Analyst 
	Behavioral Skills/Capabilities:

Enterprise Leadership Behaviors
•    Set The Agenda: Define What Winning Looks Like, Put Enterprise Thinking First, Lead with an External Perspective
•    Bring Others With You: Build the Best Team, Seek & Provide Coaching Feedback, Make Collaboration Essential
•    Do It The Right Way: Communicate Frequently, Candidly & Clearly, Make Decisions Quickly & Effectively, Live the Blue Box Values, Great Leadership Demands Courage
